thread.title: BRIEF-Dai Nippon Printing partners with Gemalto for mobile payment in Japan
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Dai Nippon Printing partners with Gemalto for mobile payment in Japan | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Dai Nippon Printing partners with Gemalto for mobile payment in Japan
text:
Oct 15 Gemalto NV :
* Says Dai Nippon Printing partners with Gemalto for secure mobile payment in Japan
* DNP will operate Gemalto's solutions, enabling its customers in payment segment to easily deploy tokenized mobile NFC services leveraging available mobile wallets and security frameworks Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
